mapper.select: select c.id 'id', c.writer 'writer', u.nickname 'wNickname', c.article, 'article', c.content 'content', c.date 'date' from article a right join comment c on a.id = c.article join user u on c.writer = u.id where a.id = #{articleId}
mapper.insert: insert into comment(writer, article, content) values (#{writer}, #{article}, #{content})
